nodes.text: Laz Lazzaz was a human male VaporTech quality inspector and the boss of Kedpin Shoklop. A lazy and very cruel man; his uncle was the main inspector. He was favored by the highest management amd they hacked theain compiter to always win the competition of the employee of the year. In 34 ABY, Kedpin finally found the cheating, and hacked the computer system too, so he won the competition and the two week vacation.
